attributes.action: make Friday's a part of the school weekend for private / independent schools
attributes.additional_details: i want the government to inforce this because i feel that this will provide more time for students and teachers to catch up on work they may have missed ( or for students, work they don’t understand ), to have more time to relax and prioritise mental health, and to spend time outdoors, with family or friends.
attributes.background: I want the government to in-force a three day weekend for private / independent schools ( friday, saturday, sunday )

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action:

Require schools to make Friday a part of the school weekend
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597715
